entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
